text: Forson Amankwah (born 31 December 2002) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for EFL Championship club Norwich City and the Ghana national team. ==Career== He made his professional debut in the Ghana Premier League for WAFA on 12 December 2019. In February 2021 he joined Austrian Bundesliga club FC Red Bull Salzburg and went on loan to FC Liefering.
